boardgame.description: From the publisher :_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The players will lead their Greek characters into a bold action of besieging Troy and rescuing the beautiful Helene._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The first one to reach 12 points will be the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During the game, various stages will unfold and during these, the victory cards are put into play. As it happens, a player can make his own army stronger or weaken those of his opponents by playing the correct cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After the siege, the strongest players will receive a victory card of their choice, all cards in play will be discarded, and a new phase will unfold with the cards remaining in each player's hand. Each player will then receive 3 new cards and the next battle round will commence._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Asmodee Editions (ASM IL01US) Long ago, in Troy... The Trojans abducted Helen, and the Achaean princes took advantage of the opportunity to lay siege on this proud city. But war during ancient times had its own set of rules. Being more than just a single, well-organized army, the Greeks will present an assortment of princes, each fighting for his own glory. Each player is an incarnation of one of these characters! The game proceeds in several successive sieges (phases of the game) during which victory cards are brought into play. With the aid of the cards in his hand, representing all the components of an ancient army (hoplites, archers, elephants, various siege engines, including the famous Trojan horse…), each player will construct a powerful army for himself, and will have to choose between sacrificing new cards from his hand (since those are not inexhaustible) or utilizing the abilities of the cards he has already placed. Each player will have to form the best army from these cards and will be torn between the multiple choices offered to him with each round of play. In this new, very tactical card game, Dominique Ehrhard brilliantly revisits the mechanisms that made Condottière so successful. The superb illustrations by John Mac Cambridge, antiquity fanatic, are an additional invitation to join the voyage. Contains: 110 cards 1 rule book 3 victory markers
BRAND NEW ! ENGLISH EDITION

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 7 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: Preferred payment is PayPal, but will accept cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks or money orders. I DO NOT accept personal checks. If you choose to pay by cashier check or money order, please include item number. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

Asmodee Editions (ASM IL01US) Long ago, in Troy... The Trojans abducted Helen, and the Achaean princes took advantage of the opportunity to lay siege on this proud city. But war during ancient times had its own set of rules. Being more than just a single, well-organized army, the Greeks will present an assortment of princes, each fighting for his own glory. Each player is an incarnation of one of these characters! The game proceeds in several successive sieges (phases of the game) during which victory cards are brought into play. With the aid of the cards in his hand, representing all the components of an ancient army (hoplites, archers, elephants, various siege engines, including the famous Trojan horse…), each player will construct a powerful army for himself, and will have to choose between sacrificing new cards from his hand (since those are not inexhaustible) or utilizing the abilities of the cards he has already placed. Each player will have to form the best army from these cards and will be torn between the multiple choices offered to him with each round of play. In this new, very tactical card game, Dominique Ehrhard brilliantly revisits the mechanisms that made Condottière so successful. The superb illustrations by John Mac Cambridge, antiquity fanatic, are an additional invitation to join the voyage. Contains: 110 cards 1 rule book 3 victory markers
For user kdean1 only

Each player is an incarnation of one of these characters! The game proceeds in several successive sieges (phases of the game) during which victory cards are brought into play. With the aid of the cards in his hand, representing all the components of an ancient army (hoplites, archers, elephants, various siege engines, including the famous Trojan horse...), each player will construct a powerful army for himself, and will have to choose between sacrificing new cards from his hand (since those are not inexhaustible) or utilizing the abilities of the cards he has already placed. Each player will have to form the best army from these cards and will be torn between the multiple choices offered to him with each round of play. In this new, very tactical card game, Dominique Ehrhard brilliantly revisits the mechanisms that made Condottière so successful. The superb illustrations by John Mac Cambridge, antiquity fanatic, are an additional invitation to join the voyage. Contains: 110 cards 1 rule book 3 victory markers

Asmodee - Iliad Language: English Players: 2 to 6 Age: 10+ Duration: about 45 min Weight: 0.280 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: The players will lead their Greek characters into a bold action of besieging Troy and rescuing the beautiful Helene. The first one to reach 12 points will be the winner. During the game, various stages will unfold and during these, the victory cards are put into play. As it happens, a player can make his own army stronger or weaken those of his opponents by playing the correct cards. After the siege, the strongest players will receive a victory card of their choice, all cards in play will be discarded, and a new phase will unfold with the cards remaining in each player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s hand. Each player will then receive 3 new cards and the next battle round will commence. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
